casename: Abdul Latif Bin Mohamed Tahiar (trading as Canary Agencies) v Saeed Husain s/o Hakim Gulam Mohiudin (trading as United Limousine)
counsel: Andrew J Hanam (Hanam & Co) for the plaintiff/appellant; K Anparasan (Khattar Wong & Partners) for the defendant/respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Pleadings/Amendment/Whether defect in pleadings can be cured by averments in affidavit.
Employment Law/Employees’ duties/Employee set up competing business whilst in employ of employer/Whether employee in breach of fiduciary duty to employer
